summary: Adds a set of clothing, boots with or without stockings and a pair of bracers.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a set of clothing, boots with or without stockings and a pair of bracers.
I got tired of it almost halfway through so this is what you get.
The screens should show you what you get :)

Ok, Just noticed after publishing the file that I actually spelled Rogue wrong, funny ;)


Important notes:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Based off the CBBE v3 body [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?[/url]

Weight 0 and 1 support but no bounce or extra bones support.

Not really lore friendly.

For the heeled boots you need at least SKSE, and HDT HH system.
SKSE: [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]h[/url][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]ttp://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]
SkyUI: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?[/url]
HDT HH: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?[/url]
Height for the boots is set to 8.5. Use SkyUI to override if you wish.

Can be smithed. It is categorized as Hide.

Minor clipping, you might not see any though.

No helmet or headgear of any sort.

Transparent stockings may not show correctly under the transparent pants.

If you wish to edit or change anything with the creationkit all my items
are named BBD... and is located under Armor/Addon and Constructible Objects.

If you don't like it, don't use it, it's optional !!!

I'm not going to make any changes or additions to it !

Type help "Rouge Genie" 0 to get all the item codes in game.




Video review by vatiwah:
[youtube]HlTo0_8m_1s[/youtube]




================================================================================
Installation
================================================================================
Copy the BBD_RGENIE.esp and BBD_RGENIE.bsa and place it in
the Skyrim data folder.
(C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\data)
Make sure it is selected during load.
